title: Wall Street Optimism Pushes J&J Toward $500 Billion Market Value
description: Johnson & Johnson reached a $500 billion stock market valuation on Wednesday as investors keep raising their bets that the firm’s strategy to cope with eroding sales for its major psoriasis drug will pan out.

title: Inside the Lab Teaching Robots to Make Coffee, Fold Laundry
description: A year-old startup is finding traction building AI software to teach robots how to tackle everyday tasks. But first…

title: AI Opens Faster Path to Trump Shipbuilding Goal, HD Hyundai Says
description: South Korean conglomerate HD Hyundai sees an opportunity to accelerate America’s shipbuilding revival by deploying artificial intelligence.
